amendment.description: To amend title II of the Immigration and Nationality Act to reform the diversity visa program and create a program that awards visas to aliens with an advanced degree in science mathematics, technology, or engineering.

action.text: Amendment SA 4114 proposed by Senator Gregg.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4114 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 42. Record Vote Number: 147.
